dc.title: The U.S. Department of Labor Home Page, Secretary of Labor Elaine L. Chao
dc.description: The U.S. Department of Labor is charged with preparing the American workforce for new and better jobs. DOL is responsible for the administration and enforcement of over 180 federal statutes.
